actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 102-55, by Mr. Gordon.

Rule provides for consideration of S. 248 with 1 hour 0 of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be considered rea d. Bill is open to amendments.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 17.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (S. 248) to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate certain segments of the Niobrara River in Nebraska and a segment of the Missouri River in Nebraska and South Dakota as components of the wild and scenic rivers systems, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of S. 248 (designating certain segments of the Niobrara River, Nebraska, and the Missouri River, Nebraska and South Dakota, as components of the wild and scenic rivers system).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (S. 248) to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate certain segments of the Niobrara River in Nebraska and a segment of the Missouri River in Nebraska and South Dakota as components of the wild and scenic rivers systems, and for other purposes.
